data.Sentence_cn: 杰里米.汉普登交际甚广，是各种聚会上深受大家欢迎的人。
data.Sentence: Jeremy Hampden has a large circle of friends and is very popular at parties.

data.Sentence_cn: 人人都钦佩他那绝妙的幽默感 -- 人人，就是说。除他6岁的女儿珍妮之外的每一个人。
data.Sentence: Everybody admires him for his great sense of humour -- everybody,that is, except his six-year-old daughter, Jenny.

data.Sentence_cn: 最近，杰里米的一个最亲密的朋友请他在一个婚礼上祝词。
data.Sentence: Recently,one of Jeremy's closest friends asked him to make a speech at a wedding reception.

data.Sentence_cn: 这正是杰里米喜欢做的事情。
data.Sentence: This is the sort of thing that Jeremy loves.

data.Sentence_cn: 他认真准备了讲稿，带着珍妮一道去参加了婚礼。
data.Sentence: He prepared the speech carefully and went to the wedding with Jenny.

data.Sentence_cn: 他的祝词里面加进了大量逗人的故事，自然大获成功。
data.Sentence: he had included a large number of funny stories in the speech and, of course, it was a great success.

data.Sentence_cn: 他刚一讲完，珍妮就对他说她要回家。
data.Sentence: As soon as he had finished, Jenny told him she wanted to go home.

data.Sentence_cn: 这不免使杰里米有点扫兴，但他还是按照女儿的要求做了。
data.Sentence: Jeremy was a little disappointed by this but he did as his daughter asked.

data.Sentence_cn: 在回家的路上，他问珍妮是否喜欢他的祝词。
data.Sentence: On the way home, he asked Jenny if she had enjoyed the speech.

data.Sentence_cn: 使他吃惊的是，她说她不喜欢。
data.Sentence: To his surprise, she said she hadn't.

data.Sentence_cn: 杰里米问他为何不喜欢，她说她不愿意看到那么多的人嘲笑他！
data.Sentence: Jeremy asked her why this was so and she told him that she did not like to see so many people laughing at him!
